title: Shoot The Fokkers v1.0
description:
STF is a first person, WW1 shooting game for mobile with cutting edge 3D graphics and high definition sound. STF uses the gyro input of your mobile device for precision aiming. 

This means absolutely anyone will be shooting Fokkers within seconds without struggling with cumbersome on-screen controls.

Features:
1. Intuitive, gyroscope-based shooting
2. Realistic 3D graphics
3. Authentic audio
4. Play-to-win Upgrades system
5. On-line scoring and Ranking
6. Twitter and Facebook connectivity

The following Android devices have been tested and are known to work well with 
Shoot The Fokkers:

Asus Transformer TF 300T
Google Nexus 7 tablet
Samsung Galaxy S2/S3/S4/Note

What's New:

Gaia - Technologies is proud to announce that this is the first release of 'Shoot The Fokkers', an exciting new WW1 shooting experience!
Expect updates soon!
